attributes.action: Call for a general election when Tony Blair steps down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want Tony Blair to call for a general election when he steps down to allow the British public a voice on who is Prime Minister. Especially needed after he promised the British public that he would serve a full term, and will break that promise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
